content: Wanted to flag https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/83167#issuecomment-819627409 here - I'll nominate if no comments or further discussion before the next triage meeting, but it feels very much like an async task to me.
We discussed this in the libs meeting an un-nominated it. But you can re-nominate it if you want to discuss it in lang.
my mistake, i misread the info log
